name: Golem Get Going
description:
Prototype group project for university's module.

Golem Rush is a game with both roguelike and platformer aspects. You play as a golem, created by a scientist deep in his underground laboratory. Your goal is to traverse the perils ahead to escape the laboratory before the scientist turns you back into scrap metal, fending off various other scrapped & non-scrapped robots as you go, you begin deep in the recesses of the laboratory’s wasted away sections after being dumped onto the 'scrap pile' of failed creations.

You can check more of our team's artwork in the links below:

https://www.artstation.com/terracora

https://www.artstation.com/ayperosia

https://www.artstation.com/sugarofcube
